## ExtrusionFeatureMixin class

Mixin class for extended THREE materials. Adds new properties required for `extrusionRatio`<!-- -->.

There is some special handling for the extrusionRatio property, which is animated via \[\[AnimatedExtrusionHandler\]\] that is using \[\[extrusionRatio\]\] setter and getter to update extrusion in a way that works well with the mixin and EdgeMaterial.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ExtrusionFeatureMixin implements ExtrusionFeature 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addExtrusionProperties()](./harp-materials.extrusionfeaturemixin.addextrusionproperties.md) |  | The mixin class should call this method to register the property \[\[extrusionRatio\]\] |
|  [applyExtrusionParameters(params)](./harp-materials.extrusionfeaturemixin.applyextrusionparameters.md) |  | Apply the extrusionRatio value from the parameters to the respective properties. |
|  [copyExtrusionParameters(source)](./harp-materials.extrusionfeaturemixin.copyextrusionparameters.md) |  | Copy extrusionRatio values from other ExtrusionFeature. |
